geeks_pro_1.first_p: WHO CAN TRAIN AT GEEKS PRO?
geeks_pro_1.second_p: Geeks Pro provides internship opportunities for both Geeks graduates and other educational centers, courses and universities.

geeks_pro_2.first_p: HOW DO I GET TO US?
geeks_pro_2.second_p: To enroll in the internship program, you need to pass a qualifying test. Please fill out the form and leave a request.

geeks_pro_3.first_p: WHAT IS THE GEEKS PRO CAREER CENTER?
geeks_pro_3.second_p: The Geeks Pro Career Center provides graduates of Geeks and other educational institutions with the opportunity to complete an internship program to improve their skills. The program includes teamwork on commercial projects, workshops on soft and hard skills, employment assistance and much more.

geeks_pro_title: STUDY IT AND BECOME AN EXPERT IN YOUR FIELD
